lyric.verse: Sashinobeta te wa karamawari Sou ne massugu arukeru no Obotsukanai ashidori de Mimitabu kara iruka wa umi wo mita Ookina mori wo Ki ga tooku naru hodo no Korogaru hoshi wo Kirikizamarete hikaru Sono kawaii mune wo Daite oyasumi TABAKO no hi ga ochitara Mou ikinasaai Momoiro no zou ga hakobu yume wo minasai Kienai yoru wo Odoriko tachi no koe wo Todaeta kaze wo Asamoya ni you hodo ni Sora wo aoide Koko e okaeri Ookina mori wo Ki ga tooku naru hodo no Korogaru hoshi wo Kirikizamarete hikaru Sono kawaii mune wo Daite oyasumi

translator.translatorname: Kazu 'Omi' Kajihara, Marcelluss D. Nealy, Goshi Manabe

lyric.verse: Reaching my hands racing nowhere Yes you can walk straight With unsteady steps A dolphin saw to the sea from your ears Big woods Unaccountable rolling stars That gleaming branded breast You shall hold them sweetly And sleep good night When the light of your cigarettes goes off Then go Dream the dream that the pink elephant brings Unerasable light Voice of the prancing children Ceased wind Look up to the sky and come back here As if inebriated with the morning mist Big woods Unaccountable rolling stars That gleaming branded breast You shall hold them sweetly And sleep good night
